fi.tuni.cezaro

Class PostController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.cezaro.PostController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class PostController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController to handle Post entity saving, delete and updating to database. Handles frontend fetch request and returns list of Posts by given search condition. Uses PosttRepository class for handling Entity Post table.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Method Detail

      • loadData

        @PostConstruct
public void loadData()
        PostConstruct method for populating Posts to database.

      • findAll

        @GetMapping(value="/posts")
public java.lang.Iterable<Post> findAll()
        Returns all Posts from database sorted by Date Descending.
        Returns:
        Iterable Post of all Posts in database.

      • getPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/post/{id}",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Optional<Post> getPost(@PathVariable
                                                                                                          long id)
        Returns particular Post by given ID long in RequestMapping.
        Parameters:
        id - long of Post ID at RequestMapping.
        Returns:
        Optional Post of found post by given argument.

      • getPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/search/{variable}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.Iterable<Post> getPost(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String variable)
        Returns all posts as Iterable Post that contains given String in RequestMapping. Fetches all posts by author that contains given string variable, after that fetches all posts by title that contains given string and compares these list objects and adds non duplicants objects to the first list and does same thing by searching all posts by Content that contains given string variable and returns List of all Post objects that contained given String variable.
        Parameters:
        variable - String of search condition at RequestMapping.
        Returns:
        Iterable Post of found posts by given argument.

      • delPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete/{id}")
public void delPost(@PathVariable
                                                           long id)
        Deletes post from database by given Post ID long. Checks if repository have Post by given long ID and deletes it from database.
        Parameters:
        id - long of Post ID at RequestMapping.

      • addPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/add")
public void addPost(@RequestBody
                                                   Post post)
        Method for saving comment to database. Takes Json format of Post as RequestBody and creates new Post by it attributes and saves it to database.
        Parameters:
        post - Json format of Post as RequestBody.

      • updatePost

        @RequestMapping(value="/update/{id}")
public void updatePost(@PathVariable
                                                              long id,
                                                              @RequestBody
                                                              Post post)
        Update method for updating existing Post at database. Takes long ID of wanted post as to be updated at RequestMapping and Json format of Post as RequestBody and updates found Post by given arguments in RequestBody.
        Parameters:
        post - Json format of Post as RequestBody.
        id - long of Post ID at RequestMapping.

      • prevPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/prevpost/{id}")
public Post prevPost(@PathVariable
                                                              long id)
        Returns previous post of given long ID at RequestMapping. If blog only contains 1 Post, this returns Post that ID was given in RequestMapping. Sorts found Posts by Date Descending.
        Parameters:
        id - long of Post ID at RequestMapping.
        Returns:
        previous or current Post.

      • nextPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/nextpost/{id}")
public Post nextPost(@PathVariable
                                                              long id)
        Returns next post of given long ID at RequestMapping. If blog only contains 1 Post, this returns Post that ID was given in RequestMapping. Sorts found Posts by Date Ascending.
        Parameters:
        id - long of Post ID at RequestMapping.
        Returns:
        next or current Post.
